com.travelsupermarket.referencedata.elasticsearch.querybuilder

Interface ElasticsearchQueryBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CarHireAutoCompleteElasticsearchQueryBuilder, FlightsAutoCompleteElasticsearchQueryBuilder, HolidaysAutoCompleteElasticsearchQueryBuilder, HotelsAutoCompleteElasticsearchQueryBuilder

    public interface ElasticsearchQueryBuilder
    Interface for classes which build queries which interact with Elasticsearch.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder buildQuery(java.lang.String searchTerm)
      Builds a query against the given search term.
      org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder buildSearchRequest(org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder queryBuilder)
      Builds a search request using the given query builder.
      default org.elasticsearch.index.query.BoolQueryBuilder createFilterQuery(java.lang.String autoCompleteType, java.lang.String fieldName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchTerms)
      Creates a query filter to reduce noise from ES.
      default java.util.List<java.lang.String> createFilterTerms(java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchTerms)
      Creates a list of search terms to filter ES results on.

    • Method Detail

      • buildQuery

        org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder buildQuery(java.lang.String searchTerm)
        Builds a query against the given search term.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - A query string parsed from the http request.
        Returns:
        An Elasticsearch query builder.

      • buildSearchRequest

        org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder buildSearchRequest(org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder queryBuilder)
        Builds a search request using the given query builder.
        Parameters:
        queryBuilder - An Elasticsearch query builder.
        Returns:
        A Search Request with the given query builder passed as the query argument.

      • createFilterQuery

        default org.elasticsearch.index.query.BoolQueryBuilder createFilterQuery(java.lang.String autoCompleteType,
                                                                         java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchTerms)
        Creates a query filter to reduce noise from ES. Makes sure results contain the correct channel autocomplete type, and that the field name contains the search term.
        Parameters:
        autoCompleteType - The channel autocomplete type being sought
        fieldName - The name of the field to filter matches on.
        searchTerms - The list of search terms that should appear in the field name given.
        Returns:
        An ES boolean query.

      • createFilterTerms

        default java.util.List<java.lang.String> createFilterTerms(java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchTerms)
        Creates a list of search terms to filter ES results on. Takes a list, creates a new list with all of those terms in, then adds all the terms again wrapped in parentheses so that iatas can be found.
        Parameters:
        searchTerms - List of search terms
        Returns:
        A list of filter search terms required.
